title: After My Son Broke Off His Engagement, His Former Fiancée Proposed to Me - Novel Updates
tags: Broken Engagement   Doting Parents   Marriage   Oneshot   Royalty   Villainess Noble Girls   Younger Love Interests
author: Yui/South no South   Yui／サウスのサウス   サウスのサウス
description: My foolish son broke off his engagement in public the other day. Therefore, to make amends (as both a father and a King) I summoned his former fiancée, Libel, the daughter of a duke, to the palace. I said she could ask for anything… but got an unexpected reply?>
